emailTagline: I’m not going to waste your time with a clunky form, reach me at my email or social media.

text.value: Misplaced praises, flowery criticism, job offers, wacky ideas for collaboration, instructive videos on how to do a silly walk; I’m all ears. Let’s talk.

I’m available to freelance in web development, data visualization and storytelling for you right now! Whether it is a personal project or a commission, I work on it with the same level of nuance and attention that I know each project deserves. Get in touch, maybe we can make something cool?
